医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
国际报告为精准糖尿病医学突破铺平道路用于糖尿病预防、诊断、治疗和预后的精准医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/International-report-paves-way-for- precision-diabetes-medicine-breakthrough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/International-report-paves-way-for- precision-diabetes-medicine-breakthrough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef485767-7e78-41e4-86e3-1f090adc932d Mon, 09 Oct 2023 04:16:00 -0400 International report paves way for precision diabetes medicine breakthrough
义翘神州宣布在美国开设新的生物加工中心义翘神州很高兴地宣布其位于美国德克萨斯州休斯顿 Levit Green 的新生物加工中心 (C4B) 正式开业，毗邻世界著名的德克萨斯医学中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Sino-Biological-Announces-the-Opening-of-Its-New-US-Based-Center-for-Bioprocessing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Sino-Biological-Announces-the-Opening-of-Its-New-US-Based-Center-for-Bioprocessing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd44d46e-9e5e-474c-865e-8bc712b4e84e Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:25:00 -0400 Sino Biological Announces the Opening of Its New US-Based Center for Bioprocessing
突破性研究可能为更好地了解和预防阿尔茨海默病带来希望截至 2020 年，大约有 580 万美国人患有阿尔茨海默病，但最近的突破性研究可能为更好地了解并可能预防这种破坏性疾病带来希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Groundwriting-research-may-provide-hope-to-better-understand-and-prevent-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Groundwriting-research-may-provide-hope-to-better-understand-and-prevent-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d855ed4-0ea1-4fb9-ba9d-21d969d6912d Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:14:00 -0400 Groundbreaking research may provide hope to better understand and prevent Alzheimer’s disease
世界卫生组织专家推荐使用武田登革热疫苗QDENGA武田今天宣布，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 免疫战略咨询专家组 (SAGE) 分享了使用 QDENGA®（登革热四价疫苗 [活减毒]） (TAK-003) 的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/WHO-experts-recommend-the-use-of-Takedas-dengue-vaccine-QDENGA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/WHO-experts-recommend-the-use-of-Takedas-dengue-vaccine-QDENGA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6246a428-1950-4a35-9364-3c34b611fe95 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:11:00 -0400 WHO experts recommend the use of Takeda's dengue vaccine QDENGA
氧化石墨烯为治疗阿尔茨海默病提供了一种有前景的新方法阿尔茨海默病的一个可能的早期驱动因素是淀粉样肽分子的积累。它们会导致细胞死亡，并且常见于阿尔茨海默病患者的大脑中。查尔姆斯理工大学的研究人员现已证明，积累这些错误折叠的淀粉样肽的酵母细胞在用氧化石墨烯纳米片处理后可以恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Graphene-Oxide-offers-a-promising-new-approach-to-treating-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Graphene-Oxide-offers-a-promising-new-approach-to-treating-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=527f92c2-f38e-415b-8368-d377e473c3f2 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:08:00 -0400 Graphene oxide offers a promising new approach to treating Alzheimer's disease
研究：60% 的英国成年人难以与医生谈论健康问题领先的远程医疗提供商 Asda Online Doctor 进行了一项全国范围的调查，以了解公众对人工智能在医疗问题方面的看法和使用情况。结果揭示了一个令人担忧的趋势，令人震惊的是，60% 的受访者承认他们很难与医生谈论自己的健康问题，而且超过一半的受访者在寻求医疗建议时不会首先寻求医生的帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-6025-of-UK-adults-struggle-to-talk-about-health-concerns-with-their-doctors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Study-6025-of-UK-adults-struggle-to-talk-about-health-concerns-with-their-doctors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c20e347-3772-4818-85d4-2c20a700ae54 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:05:00 -0400 Study: 60% of UK adults struggle to talk about health concerns with their doctors
皮肤发痒、手部刺痛或伤口愈合缓慢可能预示着隐藏的糖尿病血液检测专家警告说，日常皮肤问题可能有更危险的原因。皮肤发痒、手部刺痛或伤口需要一段时间才能愈合，通常需要快速抓挠或贴膏药。然而，它们也是 2 型糖尿病鲜为人知的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Itchy-skin-tingling-hands-or-slow-healing-cuts-may-signal-hidden-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Itchy-skin-tingling-hands-or-slow-healing-cuts-may-signal-hidden-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68218afb-a4da-4792-b9c8-467fc3e36604 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 03:00:00 -0400 Itchy skin, tingling hands or slow-healing cuts may signal hidden diabetes
英国首个全身 PET 成像平台可提高药物发现的质量和速度Medicines Discovery Catapult (MDC)、医学研究委员会 (MRC) 和 Innovate UK 之间的合作将通过推出英国首个国家全身正电子发射断层扫描 (PET) 成像平台来实现科学突破药物发现https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UKs-first-of-its-kind-total-body-PET-imaging-platform-could-enhance-quality-and-speed-of-drug-发现.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/UKs-first-of-its-kind-total-body-PET-imaging-platform-could-enhance-quality-and-speed-of-drug- discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3364ad83-e14c-4bee-8272-8c46ffd636b1 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 02:54:00 -0400 UK's first-of-its-kind total-body PET imaging platform could enhance quality and speed of drug discovery
阻断TIM-3检查点分子可促进弥漫性内在干胶质瘤的抗肿瘤免疫反应来自 Cima 和纳瓦拉临床大学的研究人员与国际合作组织弥漫性中线胶质瘤 (DMG-ACT) 一起证实，在最具侵袭性的儿童癌症动物模型中，阻断免疫检查点分子可以减少肿瘤并延长生存期。这项在纳瓦拉大学癌症中心进行的研究表明，抑制 TIM-3 可以促进弥漫性内在干胶质瘤 (DIPG) 的免疫记忆，并改善该疾病的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Blocking-TIM-3-checkpoint-molecule-promotes-antitumor-immune-response-in-diffuse-intrinsic-stem-glioma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Blocking-TIM-3-checkpoint-molecule-promotes-antitumor-immune-response-in-diffuse-intrinsic-stem-glioma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a098a96-a0c2-4be7-9d1e-39404dd841f7 Mon, 09 Oct 2023 02:51:00 -0400 Blocking TIM-3 checkpoint molecule promotes antitumor immune response in diffuse intrinsic stem glioma
人工智能在审阅科学论文方面能否超越人类专家？人工智能驱动的模型与专家相匹配，为科学手稿提供富有洞察力的反馈，在评估研究质量和潜力方面证明同样有效，甚至更有效。该工具基于 GPT-4 架构，有效简化了同行评审流程，提供了许多研究人员认为有价值且有意重用的定制建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Can-AI-outshine- human-experts-in-reviewing-scientific-papers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231009/Can-AI-outshine- human-experts-in-reviewing-scientific-papers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9625090-b473-4b65-bf29-ce5e533ecf6c Mon, 09 Oct 2023 00:11:00 -0400 Can AI outshine human experts in reviewing scientific papers?
